import React from 'react'; import {Fade} from 'react-reveal'; import '../styles/Foundations.css'; import foundations from '../images/foundations.png'; import gold from '../images/gold.png'; import handson1 from '../images/handson1.jpg'; import handson2 from '../images/handson2.jpg'; import handson3 from '../images/handson3.jpg'; import tools from '../images/tools.png'; const Foundations = (props) => { return (

Hands-on Practice

Students will have the opportunity to practice the fundamentals during and after the workshop through private sessions with the mentors.

Toolkit Included

Students will be provided a toolkit consisting of

Wahl Magic clip
Andis Slimline Pro | Andis Profoil
Styling comb | Flat top comb
Scissors | Straight razor
Barber cape
Spray bottle

Day One

(10:00am - 4:00pm)
  • Introduction
  • Health & Safety
  • Understanding Tools
  • Consultation
  • Demonstration - Lvl 1 Fade & Taper
  • Lunch (provided)
  • Hands-on practice

Day Two

(10:00am - 4:00pm)
  • Review of day one
  • Demonstration - Skin fade
  • Demonstration - Scissor Work
  • Demonstration - Beard Work
  • Lunch (provided)
  • Hands-on practice
) } export default Foundations;
